title: This Lexus IS Wagon Design Gets Everything Right
description: The internet is full of half-witted, AI-generated car renderings, but occasionally, one of them does it right. Instagram user Kelsonik recently posted a reimagining of the Lexus IS, turning it into a sleek wagon that would almost certainly be a hit with enthusiasts. Some expected Lexus to ...
titleSummary: Lexus' Elegant Estate Car Conveys Luxury, Style, and Function in Perfect Harmony
descriptionSummary: Rarely do AI-generated car designs impress, but when they do, they're striking. One such example is an Instagram user's transformation of the Lexus IS into a stylish wagon, poised to capture the hearts of driving enthusiasts.

title: Cadillac’s Blackwing Can Hit 1,000 HP With This Simple Bolt-On Upgrade
description: The Cadillac CT5-V Blackwing already boasts an impressive 668 horsepower and 659 pound-feet of torque courtesy of a supercharged 6.2-liter V8, but if that's not enough, Magnuson Superchargers has a new replacement blower that can push Cadillac's most powerful sedan into four-digit territory. The ...
titleSummary: "Blackwing's Secret Sauce: Boosting 1,000 HP with a Single High-Performance Component Upgrade"
descriptionSummary: Take the already potent Cadillac CT5-V Blackwing to new heights with a high-performance supercharger upgrade from Magnuson Superchargers. This boost promises to catapult the luxurious sedan past 1,000 horsepower, delivering exhilarating acceleration and unbridled power.

title: How a Tiny 3D-Printed Part Made the Mustang GTD Faster Than Every Ferrari
description: The 2025 Ford Mustang GTD is not just another high-horsepower, special-edition muscle car. It is now one of the fastest production cars in the world, thanks to a blistering 6:52.072 lap around the Nürburgring in April 2025. That makes it quicker than any Ferrari around the track, with the 296 GTB ...
titleSummary: "Ferrari Topped by Ford's High-Tech Speed Demon"
descriptionSummary: The Ford Mustang GTD has shattered expectations as one of the fastest production cars globally, with a scorching 6:52.072 lap at the Nürburgring in April 2025 – outpacing even the mighty Ferrari 296 GTB on the track.

title: One Man's $77M Ferrari Obsession Becomes the Auction of the Year
description: One of the most impressive Ferrari-focused auctions in recent memory is about to take place. RM Sotheby’s will offer The Tailored for Speed Collection at The Dolder Grand Hotel in Zürich on 11 October 2025, a single-owner treasure trove filled with the rarest supercars and hypercars in the world. ...
titleSummary: "Tycoon's Lavish Ferrari Collection Sells for Record-Breaking $77 Million at High-Stakes Auction"
descriptionSummary: In a rare opportunity for Ferrari enthusiasts, RM Sotheby's is set to present an extraordinary collection of ultra-rare supercars at The Dolder Grand Hotel in Zürich on October 11, 2025.

title: Hyundai Design Chief Declares: “I’ve Seen Enough” of LED Light Bars
description: LED light bars have become all the rage in the auto industry, with companies from all corners of the market adding eye-catching lighting elements to vehicles. Hyundai was an early mover with light bars, but its design boss isn’t so in love with them anymore, saying, “I’ve seen enough.” Speaking ...
titleSummary: "Hyundai's Design Head Breaks with Tradition on Glaring LED Accents"
descriptionSummary: The trend of LED light bars has swept through the automotive industry, with many manufacturers incorporating striking light features into their designs. Hyundai's design chief now seems to have cooled on this idea, expressing a sense of familiarity fatigue.

title: Why Tesla’s Cybertruck and Model 3 Didn’t Get IIHS Top Safety Picks
description: The 2025 TeslaCybertruck and Model 3 have missed out on Insurance Institute for Highway Safety (IIHS) Top Safety Pick+ and Top Safety Pick awards due to Acceptable, Marginal, and Poor ratings across a handful of categories. Tesla’s Cybertruck received Good ratings in the moderate overlap front ...
titleSummary: "Cybertruck's Tough Ride: How Tesla Models Missed IIHS' Top Safety Bumper"
descriptionSummary: The Tesla Cybertruck and Model 3 have fallen short of top safety honors from the Insurance Institute for Highway Safety (IIHS) due to mixed ratings in several key crash tests, including disappointing results in small overlap collisions.

title: Jaguar Land Rover Cyberattack Is Forcing Layoffs at Its Suppliers
description: One of the United Kingdom's major automakers was severely impacted by a cyberattack late last month, and the consequences are spreading across its supply chain well beyond its factories. As a result, production at its facilities has been halted for nearly three weeks, resulting in billions of ...
titleSummary: "Global Carmaker's Cyber Breach Sparks Massive Supplier Downsizing Effort"
descriptionSummary: A prominent UK car manufacturer suffered a crippling cyberattack last month, disrupting operations and triggering a ripple effect throughout its extensive network of suppliers, forcing factory shutdowns that have lasted over two weeks and caused significant losses.

title: Dodge's Future EVs Won't Need a Charger, Thanks to Radical New Battery Tech
description: Stellantis is successfully testing a revolutionary approach to electric vehicle battery design that could reshape its EV architecture. The Intelligent Battery Integrated System (IBIS) integrates the inverter and charger functions directly into battery modules, eliminating the need for separate ...
titleSummary: "Plug-and-Go Revolution: Dodge's Next-Gen EVs Hitting the Road with Breakthrough Battery Power"
descriptionSummary: Stellantis is pioneering a groundbreaking EV battery design, dubbed IBIS, which seamlessly integrates critical components within individual battery modules. This innovative approach could fundamentally redefine the company's electric vehicle architecture going forward.

title: Why Congress Wants to Force AM Radio Back Into New Cars
description: When was the last time you listened to an AM radio broadcast in your car? The answer likely depends on your age and, to a lesser extent, the type of car you're driving. AM radio is disappearing from many new cars, but particularly EVs because their powertrains create electrical interference that AM ...
titleSummary: "Congress Pushes to Reboot AM Radio in Modern Vehicles Again"
descriptionSummary: The nostalgic sound of AM radio has largely faded from modern vehicles, especially electric cars, where their unique powertrains can disrupt reception and render the service obsolete in many newer models.

title: Ultra-Rare 2024 McLaren 750S Spider Triple Crown For Sale with 3,400 Miles
description: When McLaren launched the 750S, it quickly became the brand’s sharpest series-production supercar. But the Triple Crown edition took things further, blending design cues from McLaren’s greatest racing triumphs: the 1974 Indy 500, the 1984 Monaco Grand Prix, and the 1995 24 Hours of Le ...
titleSummary: "Rare 2024 McLaren 750S Triumvirate Unleashed: A 3,400-Mile Rarity on the Market"
descriptionSummary: McLaren's sleek 750S was a revelation when it debuted, showcasing the brand's finest craftsmanship. The Triple Crown edition pushes boundaries further still, drawing inspiration from McLaren's most iconic racing victories across three decades.

title: Rivian may have finally fixed the R1T's power tonneau cover
description: A tonneau cover for a pickup truck bed might seem like a simple component, but it's been a major sticking point for Rivian. The automaker is now on the third version of its powered tonneau cover since the featured launched with the R1T electric truck in 2022. The upgraded version is now listed on ...
titleSummary: Rivian Tames Troublesome Tailgate on Electric Pickup
descriptionSummary: Rivian has faced challenges perfecting its powered tonneau cover, a feature that's been refined over three iterations since its debut with the R1T electric pickup in 2022. A new upgrade has recently appeared on the automaker's website.

title: BMW’s Legendary V8 M3 Just Got a Modern Exhaust Upgrade
description: With its naturally-aspirated 4.0-liter V8, the E92-generation BMW M3 coupe (along with the E90 sedan and E93 convertible) brought a unique sound to the BMW M lineup that, with the M Division's subsequent adoption of turbocharged engines, has never been replicated. But it can be improved, reckons ...
titleSummary: "Retro Muscle Gets a Sonic Boost in BMW's Updated M3 Beast"
descriptionSummary: The naturally aspirated 4.0-liter V8 in the E92 M3 coupe and its sedan and convertible counterparts created a distinctive tone in BMW's M lineup that's yet to be matched by subsequent turbocharged models. Some argue there's room for enhancement, however.

title: Mercedes-AMG Models Must Answer One Question: ‘Is It Batman Enough?’
description: Superman might be faster than a speeding bullet, but Batman's brooding persona makes the Dark Knight more than the equal of the Man of Steel in comic book fans' hearts. And apparently the hearts of executives at Mercedes-AMG as well. "We are Batman, we are not Superman because Superman is a little ...
titleSummary: "Can This High-Octane Ride Outdo the Caped Crusader's Rival Rides?"
descriptionSummary: Mercedes-AMG has thrown its weight behind the Caped Crusader, citing his complex, brooding nature as a key reason why he resonates with fans and sets him apart from other superheroes, including Superman.

title: The 2026 Kia Carnival Hi Limousine Is Basically a Private Jet on Wheels
description: Launched in South Korea, the 2026 Carnival Hi Limousine boasts a taller roof, reclining chairs, and starry lighting for premium comfort without high-end costs.
titleSummary: "Kia Takes Luxury Road Travel to New Heights with Carnival Hi-Limousine Model"
descriptionSummary: Experience elevated comfort at an affordable price with the 2026 Carnival Hi Limousine, featuring a sleeker design, plush reclining seats, and a celestial ambiance that redefines road trips in South Korea.

title: Dutch Coachbuilder Revives Packard With a One-Off $Million Excellence
description: The sleek lines of the Excellence evoke 1950s Facel Vega styling cues.

descriptionSummary: The Excellence's streamlined design draws inspiration from the elegant, retro-futurism of the iconic 1950s Facel Vega, marrying classic sophistication with modern sensibility.

title: Subaru Legacy Sedan is Officially No More
description: According to a statement released by Subaru of Indiana Automotive (SIA), the North American facility responsible for production of Subaru's Ascent, Crosstrek, and Outback models, the absolute final unit of the Subaru Legacy sedan has rolled off the assembly line, wrapping 36 years of U.S. ...

descriptionSummary: Subaru's North American manufacturing plant in Indiana has marked a significant milestone as it completes production of the Subaru Legacy sedan after three decades and 36 years in the United States, bringing an era to a close.

title: Godzilla V8 Teardown Uncovers Ford’s Hidden Engine Weakness
description: Ford's 7.3-liter "Godzilla" V8 arrived about five years ago as the company's largest modern pushrod engine, aimed at heavy-duty trucks and available as a performance crate motor. Built around a cast-iron block and a simple overhead-valve layout, it promised old-school durability with modern ...
titleSummary: "Ford's $10K Beast Exposed: Teardown Reveals Shocking V8 Vulnerability"
descriptionSummary: Ford's behemoth 7.3-liter V8 engine made its debut five years ago, designed to dominate the heavy-duty truck scene and offered as a high-performance crate motor for enthusiasts seeking raw power and reliability.

title: Crash Test Ratings 2025: Surprise Winners and Painful Drops After IIHS’s Rear-Seat Rule
description: The  US’ Insurance Institute for Highway Safety (IIHS)  raised the bar for 2025 and tied its Top Safety Pick awards to rear-seat safety. The updated 'moderate overlap front test' now puts a second dummy behind the driver and requires Acceptable for TSP and Good for TSP+ in that ...
titleSummary: Rear Seat Safety Shake-Up: Automakers' Grades Plummet as New IIHS Standards Bite Back
descriptionSummary: The US-based Insurance Institute for Highway Safety has revised its safety standards, mandating enhanced protection for rear seat occupants as part of its Top Safety Pick awards. This includes a tougher front crash test with an additional dummy.

title: Honda Is Reinventing Green Cars One Recycled Part at a Time
description: Honda has launched its groundbreaking Resource Circularity Center near its Marysville and East Liberty Auto Plants in Ohio, marking a shift toward sustainable automotive manufacturing. This facility addresses the need for green consciousness at every step of the manufacturing process by ...

descriptionSummary: Honda's innovative Resource Circularity Center has opened near its Ohio plants, ushering in a new era of eco-friendly automotive production. The facility prioritizes sustainability throughout every stage of manufacturing, from design to delivery.

title: 2025 Mazda CX-5 vs 2026 Mazda CX-5: What's the Big Deal?
description: The Mazda CX-5 began production as a 2013 model and is one of Mazda's most successful crossover SUVs. In fact, it's one of the automaker's best-selling vehicles - ever. As of July 2025, cumulative global sales of the Mazda CX-5 have exceeded 4.5 million units. In the United States alone, more than ...
titleSummary: "New vs Updated: How the Latest Mazda CX-5 Compares to Its Predecessor"
descriptionSummary: Mazda's hit crossover SUV, the CX-5, has been rolling off production lines since its debut in 2013 and boasts an impressive track record as one of the brand's top sellers worldwide, with over 4.5 million units sold globally by mid-2025.

title: Nobody Asked, but Italdesign Is Reviving the Honda NSX Anyway
description: Here's a mashup we weren't expecting. Italdesign-Giugiaro—the Italian styling house responsible for everything from the Lotus Esprit and Maserati Bora to the original Volkswagen Golf and Hyundai Pony—is planning a tribute to the Honda NSX (or Acura NSX to Americans) the Japanese supercar that kept ...
titleSummary: "Unsanctioned Revival: Italian Designers Give Iconic Honda Supercar a Second Life"
descriptionSummary: Italian design icon Italdesign-Giugiaro is paying homage to a unlikely hero: the Honda NSX. Known for their work on the Volkswagen Golf and Maserati Bora, they're crafting a tribute to this Japanese sports car phenomenon.

title: Porsche is looking for ways to build more manual 911s
description: New cars with manual transmissions are scarce, but the Porsche 911 still has a few stick shift options left in its sprawling lineup. In the current 992.2 generation, the 911 GT3 and the 911 Carrera T are both available with a six-speed manual, and in a recent interview with Evo, 911 line lead ...
titleSummary: Porsche Seeks Solution to Meet Demand for Shift-Stick 911 Models
descriptionSummary: Porsche's iconic 911 remains one of the few high-performance cars still offering a manual transmission option. The 911 GT3 and 911 Carrera T variants boast a six-speed stick shift, satisfying enthusiasts who prefer to row their own gears.

title: Fall Is America’s Deadliest Driving Season—Here’s Why
description: According to CARFAX data, fall accounts for the most crashes in 39 out of 50 U.S. states, outpacing even winter. Shorter days mean more driving in the dark, and the risk of wildlife collisions spikes as deer migration season begins. Add in slick roads covered in wet leaves, and suddenly the ...
titleSummary: "Fatal Autoway: The Hidden Dangers of the Frightful Fall Drive"
descriptionSummary: As fall sets in, a surge in crashes sweeps across 39 US states, with CARFAX data revealing that autumn eclipses winter as the most accident-prone season. Dimmer days and migrating wildlife heighten the risk of collisions on slippery roads.

title: Restored 1964 Porsche 356C Coupe Surfaces With Under 50K Miles
description: The Porsche 356C represents the peak of Stuttgart's sports car genesis, marking the final evolution before the 911. What makes the 'C' model special is its four-wheel disc brake system, a first for the 356 line that delivered dramatically improved stopping power and heat dissipation. It helped ...
titleSummary: Rare '64 Porsche Gem Emerges with Impressive Low Mileage and Original Charm
descriptionSummary: The Porsche 356C embodies the pinnacle of Stuttgart's sports car heritage, a refinement point before the iconic 911 debuted. Its pioneering four-wheel disc brakes revolutionized stopping performance, setting a new standard for speed and control on the road.

title: Why All EVs Look the Same Now—And How Tesla, BYD, and Polestar Break the Mold
description: Scroll through any EV lot and the silhouettes start to blur. Tesla Model 3, BYD Seal, Polestar 2 — they’re all sleek fastbacks with smooth faces, flush handles, and long wheelbases. That’s not imitation; that’s physics. Electric range lives and dies on drag coefficient, and the fastest way to hit ...
titleSummary: "EVs in a Rut: Breaking Free with Innovative Designs from Tesla and More"
descriptionSummary: In electric vehicles, form and function converge in a striking way. Sleek designs like the Model 3 and Polestar 2 owe their aerodynamic efficiency to shared physical principles: smooth faces, flush surfaces, and optimized body shapes that minimize wind resistance. This design commonality isn't coincidence – it's crucial for maximizing range.

title: Hyundai Recalls Over Half a Million Cars—Palisade Seat Belts Can Fail in a Crash

title: Lewis Hamilton Ditches £13M Supercar Collection for a Surprising New Passion

descriptionSummary: Formula One legend Lewis Hamilton's impressive car collection, valued at around £13 million, included rare models like the Pagani Zonda 760LH and LaFerrari. His personal garages showcased his love for high-performance vehicles off the track as well as on.

descriptionSummary: Hyundai Motor Group unveiled ambitious expansion plans Thursday, with a significant portion of its $55 billion investment directed towards the US market as part of its long-term "Vision and Product Roadmap" strategy.

title: Why Nissan Is Killing the Ariya EV After Just Two Years
description: The Nissan Ariya has been on sale for a couple of years now, but it started life with significant delays and never really caught on once it finally did arrive. Given Nissan’s financial troubles and the state of global trade, it likely won’t come as a surprise to hear that the electric crossover is ...
titleSummary: "Nissan Cuts Short the Life of Its Electric Flagship"
descriptionSummary: The Nissan Ariya's rollout was marred by setbacks, launching into a crowded market when consumer interest and global economic stability were already wavering, casting a shadow over its long-term prospects.

title: Hyundai’s Next U.S. Pickup Will Be More Tacoma Than Santa Cruz

In its 2025 CEO Investor Day presentation, Hyundai confirmed a midsize truck would arrive ...

descriptionSummary: Hyundai's unconventional Santa Cruz pickup is set to be joined by a more conventional offering in North America, as announced during the company's 2025 CEO Investor Day presentation. A midsize truck from Hyundai is expected to hit the market by the end of the decade.

title: Crown Rally Ends in Disaster After Trailer Fire Destroys $1.5M Worth of Supercars
description: What should have been the final leg of an exclusive automotive adventure turned catastrophic. title: Tesla Keeps Settling Autopilot Death Lawsuits—And That's a Big Shift
description: Tesla has once again settled an Autopilot wrongful death lawsuit for an undisclosed amount, avoiding another potentially damaging jury trial. The tragic case involves 15-year-old Jovani Maldonado Garcia, who died in 2019 when a Tesla Model 3 using Autopilot rear-ended the car he was in. The ...

descriptionSummary: A second wrongful death lawsuit involving Tesla's Autopilot system has been settled out of court, following a similar arrangement made to avoid a potentially damaging trial in a case stemming from a fatal crash in 2019 that claimed the life of a 15-year-old passenger.

title: Bentley Charges $68,000 for This Stunning Paint Fade
description: Bentley is always looking to push the limits of hand craftsmanship, and sometimes one exquisite paint finish isn't enough. The automaker debuted its Ombré color-fade paint finish on a Continental GT coupe at Monterey Car Week last month, using a time-consuming process to create a fade effect that ...

descriptionSummary: Bentley continues to elevate traditional craftsmanship with innovative techniques. At this year's Monterey Car Week, the brand showcased an exclusive Ombré-inspired paint finish on a Continental GT coupe, achieved through a painstakingly detailed application process.

title: Whiskey Meets Speed: Cadillac F1 Strikes Blockbuster Deal with Jim Beam Before 2026 Debut
description: Cadillac’s long-anticipated Formula 1 debut in 2026 just got a shot of American heritage. The automaker confirmed a multi-year partnership with Jim Beam, making the bourbon distiller its official spirits partner. For Cadillac, the move reinforces its identity as a proudly American ...

title: Mayor Pushes Button to Crush Seized Dodge Durango Hellcat
description: Street takeovers have been a big problem in some places, leading to injuries, property damage, and a whole load of other issues. descriptionSummary: In recent years, street takeovers have sparked concerns over safety and property damage in various cities. A tactic employed by some law enforcement agencies involves publicly showcasing impounded vehicles from these events as a deterrent, but one department is exploring alternative approaches.

title: Toyota's New App Predicts When You'll Forget to Charge, and Fixes It
description: Toyota's ChargeMinder prototype app tackles the biggest challenge facing plug-in hybrid electric vehicle (PHEV) owners, which is remembering to charge their cars in the first place. Using behavioral science and real-time vehicle data, the app delivers just-in-time charging reminders that appear ...
titleSummary: "Smartphone Assistant Alerts Drivers to Low Battery, Sends Charging Reminder"
descriptionSummary: Toyota's innovative ChargeMinder app uses advanced technology and behavioral insights to help plug-in hybrid drivers stay on top of their vehicles' energy needs, sending timely reminders to ensure they never forget a crucial charge.

title: Stellantis Looks To Snoopy To Increase Chrysler Pacifica Sales
description: Chrysler is betting that nostalgia and family-friendly charm can move the sales needle in a minivan segment that has steadily shrunk under the weight of crossovers and SUVs. Rather than revisiting its own history, Chrysler is borrowing a cultural icon with nearly universal recognition. The ...
titleSummary: Pacifica Gets Peanuts Push: Chrysler Counts on Beloved Cartoon Character for Boost
descriptionSummary: Chrysler is counting on a winning formula: nostalgia and family appeal. To revitalize its minivan sales, the brand has turned to an unmistakable cultural symbol that transcends generations.

description: Every so often, a car surfaces that even seasoned Bentley enthusiasts have to look twice at. titleSummary: "Rare Find: '92 Bentley Estate Seeks New Home After Decades of Low-Mileage Use"
descriptionSummary: A rare gem that has even die-hard Bentley aficionados doing double takes: the 1992 Val D'Isere. This bespoke shooting brake, born from a Turbo R base and commissioned by the Sultan of Brunei, boasts a unique blend of style and all-wheel-drive prowess.

title: Flying Cars Prove They Can Crash Just Like Regular Ones
description: Two flying cars crashed into each other during a rehearsal for an airshow in northeastern China on Tuesday, injuring one pilot and forcing one vehicle to the ground, where it caught fire. The collision occurred in Changchun as the city prepared for its five-day airshow, with both eVTOL vehicles ...

descriptionSummary: A dramatic rehearsal crash took place in northeastern China's Changchun, leaving a pilot injured and one flying car engulfed in flames after colliding mid-air during an airshow warm-up.

title: Toyota GR Corolla 2.0? Japan Gets the Tougher, Cooler Hot Hatch First
description: The Toyota GR Corolla is already one of the most hardcore hot hatches on the market, but Toyota isn’t standing still. titleSummary: "Japan Claims Priority in Toyota's Latest High-Performance Hot Hatch Arrival"
descriptionSummary: Toyota's GR Corolla has already earned its place as one of the most extreme hot hatches available, but Toyota is pushing it further. A revised version debuts in Japan on November 3, 2025, with refinements centered around enhanced structural integrity, cooling performance, and long-term durability.
